title: Hail, glorious day! ere long to dawn

verses.text: Hail, glorious day! ere long to dawn, And set at rest our hopes: O glorious morn! the trump comes forth, With shouts of victory.
And when my Saviour shall appear, If in the grave I lie, All nature shall come forth in life, And live, no more to die.
I shall arise in that bright dayâ€” In death, my weary eyes. In that bright morn, my Lord to see, And meet him in the skies.
And in that resurrection morn I shall his face behold; Th thou my Lord to me will give The starry crown of gold.
